remarks: Equivalence of two versions of the Axiom of Choice.  The proof uses the Axiom of Regularity.  The right-hand side is our original ~ ax-ac . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
statement:
dfac0 $p |- ( CHOICE <-> A. x E. y A. z A. w ( ( z e. w /\ w e. x ) -> E. v A. u ( E. t ( ( u e. w /\ w e. t ) /\ ( u e. t /\ t e. y ) ) <-> u = v ) ) ) $.
$d t u v w x y z $.
